TopicTitle: Unable to move vertically in VAB

Articles.Content: I've been unable to move vertically in the VAB or SPH. I've tried troubleshooting everything and cannot seem to find the solution for the life of me. I tried the scroll wheel and every other solution I can think of and none of them work.

I mean screenshots would be nice but we can go from here.

1. Try clean install.

2. Check drivers maybe??

3. Holding left-click and moving the mouse up and down is used to navigate in the SPH, as it is more horizontal than vertical.

@HoboGrifter

One more thing I'll add to what SG said above:  Check the input locks.  CTRL+ALT+F12 will bring up the cheat menu, and somewhere in there is a setting to lock inputs.  Check to make sure that is unchecked.
